name: AllergyToHPVVaccine
title: Allergy to HPV Vaccine
description: SCT codes for allergy to HPV vaccine
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Codes for allergy to HPV vaccine or to HPV vaccine as a substance/product),(Data Element Scope: ALLERGY:),(Inclusion Criteria: SNOMED CT codes for allergy to and intolerance of HPV vaccine and for HPV vaccine as a substance/product.),(Exclusion Criteria: Invalid codes)
